About Me

Hi! I am Neha Muthiyan, final year CSE undergraduate at Indian Institute of Technology, Mandi. Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning are my areas of interest. I like to play badminton, wrtie blog posts and travel in my free time.

Project:

Describe your role here

Research Intern

Dec 2016 - Feb 2017
Siemens Corporate Technologies Pvt. Ltd., Bangalore

Project: Energy Load Forecasting using Recurrent Neural Networks

Recurrent Neural Networks are able to learn long range dependencies in the dataset. Long Short Term Memory and Gated Recurrent Unit networks were explored due to vanishing and exploding gradient problem of vanilla RNN. IBM SPSS software was used for ARIMA modelling of the energy load dataset.

Technologies used: Python, Keras, IBM SPSS

Education

Projects

Supervised Deep Learning Framework for Proactive Anomaly Detection in Cloud

A two stage novel model was built where in 1st stage, hybrid of LSTM and BLSTM is used to predict future resource usage. In 2nd stage, LSTM classification model was build to classify expected state as normal or abnormal.

Technologies used: Keras, Python, Docker
On the Fly Encryptor

Each data block is encrypted and stored on write and decrypted on read. Kernel read and write functions were modified for this purpose.
Data Management Systems for next-generation astronomical datasets

Clustered MariaDb was used as database management system. Database was tested on exact search queries, range queries, index queries, etc.

Technologies used: MariaDb, Galera cluster
Increasing Seatbelt Awareness among Himachali drivers (Socio Technical Project)

Surveys were conducted to identify root cause of lack of seat belt awareness. Built a prototype which can track whether passengers in car are wearing seat belts. Seat belt usage data is futher sent over cloud.

Technologies used: IR sensors, GSM modeule, accelerometer, MySQL
Hand Gesture Replication Robotic Arm

Arduino controlled robotic arm to replicate the human hand. Motion sensors like accelerometers, gyro sensors and flex sensors were used to take signals from the human hand. Uses Prediction and Correction algorithm for precise replication.

Farmers Mart

Portal provides facility for online purchase of groceries. Joomla was used to build website.

Online Banking Portal

Portal provides facility for online secure money transactions, creating accounts and checking balance.

Technologies used: MySQL, PHP, Python, JavaScript, HTML, CSS
Knock Lock

Arduino and Piezo sensor based lock. Piezo sensor was used to detect the vibrations. Used Arduino programming for input processing.
